Subject: SAT Exam - Multiple Choice Questions

Background Information:
The SAT (Scholastic Assessment Test) is a standardized exam widely used for college admissions in the United States. It assesses students' skills in critical reading, writing, and math and is typically taken by high school students aiming to pursue higher education.
